Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2012 12:32PM marina1963 wrote: I was diagnosed with locally advanced cancer a little over 6 years ago,with a huge 13 cm tumor and tons of positive nodes and here I am,doing well,cancer free after 6 years. I had neo-adjuvant chemotherapy,surgery,radiation, 1 year of Herceptin and doing great.There is hope for every stage III sister and I am pretty sure you will beat this,even it seems so hard to deal with in the beginning. Marina
Posts.Title: Would love to hear from some long term Stage III survivors... lanagraves jenni__ca

Posts.Content: Oct 21, 2012 02:48AM marina1963 wrote: I hope my story will give hope and encouragement to those who will read it. I am 6.5 years out and still doing well. My diagnosis was really scary: locally advanced breast cancer (the surgeon said IBC at first because of skin involvement,then he changed to IDC,but it doesn't matter at this point),lots of positive nodes (I had neoadjuvant chemo and no cancer could be found at the time of surgery,but the surgeon thinks I had more than 20 nodes infected), a huge 13 cm tumor,ER/PR-,HER2+++.I am still here,aproaching my 7 year mark,and still doing good. Marina
Posts.Title: Positive nodes with long term survival many Lily55

Posts.Content: Apr 14, 2012 11:20AM marina1963 wrote: Thank you ladies for welcoming me to this discussion thread. Lago,you will get to your 6 year anniversary before you know it !!!
Posts.Title: Calling All with Tumors 6 cm + J-Bug CaliKelly

Posts.Content: Apr 13, 2012 06:38PM marina1963 wrote: I am one of those with a big tumor of 13 cm. I was diagnosed in March 2006 a little over 6 years ago with locally advanced breast cancer,ER/PR-,HER2+++, Had lots of lymph nodes involved and still doing great,cancer free. I had neoadjuvat chemo(4 AC followed by 4 Taxotere/Herceptin and continued 1 year of Herceptin),then surgery and radiation and later on DIEP reconstruction. The pathologic report showed no cancer in my breast or nodes after chemo. I had prophylactic mastectomy on my healthy breast ,bu this was only my choice. Marina
Posts.Title: Calling All with Tumors 6 cm + J-Bug CaliKelly
